title: Element 1 Quiz - Review Client Support Issues
description: Test your understanding of how to review and resolve client support issues.

questions.text: What should be your FIRST step when handling a new client support issue?

answers.text: Check the support log for the new problem details
Call the client to schedule a meeting

questions.text: Why is it important to check previous logs for similar problems?

answers.text: To find proven solutions and save investigation time
To see which technician handled it before
To copy the exact same solution without modifications

questions.text: When communicating with clients, you should use ___ language and avoid technical ___.
After implementing a solution, you should obtain client ___ to ensure the issue is fully resolved.
What information should be included when documenting a support issue?

answers.text: Steps taken, root cause, proposed solution, and any limitations
The amount of time spent on the issue

questions.text: Describe a situation where you would need to notify a client about the results of your investigation. What key information should you include in your communication? (3-4 sentences)
